src_lang: According to him, the impact of the malaria epidemic is huge, with [ Nigeria ] losing about N132 billion on prevention, research and treatment of the disease.
template: Bisa ga cewarshi , koma bayan da cutar malariya take kawowa yana da yawan gaske , kasancewa Najeriya tana asarar kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu wajen rigakafi da bincike da kuma jinyar cutar .
tgt_lang: Bisa ga cewarshi, koma bayan da cutar malariya take kawowa yana da yawan gaske, kasancewa [ Najeriya ] tana asarar kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu wajen rigakafi da bincike da kuma jinyar cutar.

Bisa ga cewarshi, koma bayan da cutar malariya take kawowa yana da yawan gaske, kasancewa [ ] Najeriya tana asarar kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu wajen rigakafi da bincike da kuma jinyar cutar.

Bisa ga cewarshi, koma bayan da cutar malariya take kawowa yana da yawan gaske, kasancewa [ Najeriya tana ] asarar kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu wajen rigakafi da bincike da kuma jinyar cutar.

Bisa ga cewarshi, koma bayan da cutar malariya take kawowa yana da yawan gaske, kasancewa [ Najeriya tana asarar ] kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu wajen rigakafi da bincike da kuma jinyar cutar.

Bisa ga cewarshi, koma bayan da cutar malariya take kawowa yana da yawan gaske, kasancewa [ Najeriya tana asarar kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu ] wajen rigakafi da bincike da kuma jinyar cutar.
tgt_entities: Najeriya tana asarar kimanin Naira biliyan dari da talatin da biyu

src_lang: However, the [ U.S. Supreme Court ] has already ruled that the government's arguments for including the citizenship question are not satisfactory, given the real reasons why it should be questioned in the decennial U.S. Census.

However, the U.S. Supreme Court has already ruled that the government's arguments for including the citizenship question are not satisfactory, given the real reasons why it should be questioned in the decennial [ U.S. ] Census.
template: Sai dai kotun kolin Amurka tuni ta yanke hukunci cewa hujjojin da gwamnati ta bayar domin saka tambayar dan kasa ba su gamsar ba , na hakikanin bayanan dalilin abinda ya kamata a tambaya lokacin kidayar jama’a a Amurka da ake yi duk bayan shekaru goma .
tgt_lang: Sai dai kotun kolin [ Amurka ] tuni ta yanke hukunci cewa hujjojin da gwamnati ta bayar domin saka tambayar dan kasa ba su gamsar ba, na hakikanin bayanan dalilin abinda ya kamata a tambaya lokacin kidayar jamaa a Amurka da ake yi duk bayan shekaru goma.

Sai dai [ kotun kolin Amurka ] tuni ta yanke hukunci cewa hujjojin da gwamnati ta bayar domin saka tambayar dan kasa ba su gamsar ba, na hakikanin bayanan dalilin abinda ya kamata a tambaya lokacin kidayar jamaa a Amurka da ake yi duk bayan shekaru goma.

Sai dai kotun kolin Amurka tuni ta yanke hukunci cewa hujjojin da gwamnati ta bayar domin saka tambayar dan kasa ba su gamsar ba, na hakikanin bayanan dalilin abinda ya kamata a tambaya lokacin kidayar [ jamaa ] a Amurka da ake yi duk bayan shekaru goma.

Sai dai kotun kolin Amurka tuni ta yanke hukunci cewa hujjojin da gwamnati ta bayar domin saka tambayar dan kasa ba su gamsar [ ba ], na hakikanin bayanan dalilin abinda ya kamata a tambaya lokacin kidayar jamaa a Amurka da ake yi duk bayan shekaru goma.

Sai dai kotun kolin Amurka tuni ta yanke hukunci cewa hujjojin da gwamnati ta bayar domin saka tambayar dan kasa ba su gamsar ba, na hakikanin bayanan dalilin abinda ya kamata a tambaya lokacin kidayar [ jamaa a Amurka ] da ake yi duk bayan shekaru goma.

src_lang: Speaking at a press conference at the end of last week's programme, Mr [ Bright Ekweremadu, ] managing director of the Society for Family Health, explained that running the programme became necessary when a national health survey conducted in 2008 showed that 17% of pregnant women were delivering in hospital in Gombe state.

Speaking at a press conference at the end of last week's programme, Mr Bright Ekweremadu, managing director of the [ Society for Family Health, ] explained that running the programme became necessary when a national health survey conducted in 2008 showed that 17% of pregnant women were delivering in hospital in Gombe state.

Speaking at a press conference at the end of last week's programme, Mr Bright Ekweremadu, managing director of the Society for Family Health, explained that running the programme became necessary when a national health survey conducted in 2008 showed that 17% of pregnant women were delivering in hospital in [ Gombe ] state.
template: Da yake jawabi a wajen wani taron manema labarai a karshen shirin makon jiya , Mr Bright Ekweremadu , manajin darektan cibiyar Society for family Health , ya bayyana cewa , gudanar da shirin ya zama dole lokacin da binciken kiwon lafiya na kasa da aka gudanar a shekara ta 2008 ya nuna cewa kashi 17 % na mata masu juna biyu ne suke kai ga haihuwa a a asibiti a jihar Gombe .
tgt_lang: Da yake jawabi a wajen wani taron manema labarai a karshen shirin makon jiya, Mr [ Bright Ekweremadu, ] manajin darektan cibiyar Society for family Health, ya bayyana cewa, gudanar da shirin ya zama dole lokacin da binciken kiwon lafiya na kasa da aka gudanar a shekara ta 2008 ya nuna cewa kashi 17 % na mata masu juna biyu ne suke kai ga haihuwa a a asibiti a jihar Gombe.

Da yake jawabi a wajen wani taron manema labarai a karshen shirin makon jiya, [ Mr Bright Ekweremadu, ] manajin darektan cibiyar Society for family Health, ya bayyana cewa, gudanar da shirin ya zama dole lokacin da binciken kiwon lafiya na kasa da aka gudanar a shekara ta 2008 ya nuna cewa kashi 17 % na mata masu juna biyu ne suke kai ga haihuwa a a asibiti a jihar Gombe.

src_lang: In January of this year, 2018, the two governments launched a number of major projects to improve the lives of [ Niger's ] people, especially in rural areas, through a program called MCCompact that allocated US$437 million, in addition to the US$18 million that Niger received to fight malaria.

In January of this year, 2018, the two governments launched a number of major projects to improve the lives of Niger's people, especially in rural areas, through a program called MCCompact that allocated US$437 million, in addition to the US$18 million that [ Niger ] received to fight malaria.
template: A watan Janairu ta wannan shekarar , 2018 , gwamnatocin biyu suka kaddamar da wadansu manyan ayyukan inganta rayuwar jama’ar Nijer musamman a yankunan karkaka , ta hanyar wani shirin da ake kira MCCompact da aka warewa milyan 437 na dallar Amurka , banda miliyan 18 da Amurka ta talllafawa Nijer domin yaki da masassarar cizon sauro .
tgt_lang: A watan Janairu ta wannan shekarar, 2018, gwamnatocin biyu suka kaddamar da wadansu manyan ayyukan inganta rayuwar jamaar [ Nijer ] musamman a yankunan karkaka, ta hanyar wani shirin da ake kira MCCompact da aka warewa milyan 437 na dallar Amurka, banda miliyan 18 da Amurka ta talllafawa Nijer domin yaki da masassarar cizon sauro.

A watan Janairu ta wannan shekarar, 2018, gwamnatocin biyu suka kaddamar da wadansu manyan ayyukan inganta rayuwar [ jamaar Nijer ] musamman a yankunan karkaka, ta hanyar wani shirin da ake kira MCCompact da aka warewa milyan 437 na dallar Amurka, banda miliyan 18 da Amurka ta talllafawa Nijer domin yaki da masassarar cizon sauro.

A watan Janairu ta wannan shekarar, 2018, gwamnatocin biyu suka kaddamar da wadansu manyan ayyukan inganta rayuwar jama [ar Nijer ] musamman a yankunan karkaka, ta hanyar wani shirin da ake kira MCCompact da aka warewa milyan 437 na dallar Amurka, banda miliyan 18 da Amurka ta talllafawa Nijer domin yaki da masassarar cizon sauro.
